detailed description go here and here
Select to manage your HDMI connection
Turn your phone into a PC
Experience your music, pictures and video on HDTV
Setup your own custom dock experience, similar to your home screen
Keep your current application in focus while your phone is in the dock
Description goes here. To be added

The TV media centre allows you to browse all of the multimedia content on your phone. While in the media centre, your phone turns into a sleek controller which allows you to easily play music, look at pictures or watch a video

Transform your phone screen into a big clock with perks. See the time from a distance, set alarms, play music, view photos and get live weather information. This mode was designed for your bedside but is useful in the kitchen and as a desk clock too.

Get access to the same Android widgets, apps and shortcuts as on your phone home screen. Arrange them and change the wallpaper to your liking. All these details will be saved and applied the next time you dock your phone.
When you select this mode, the phone will keep your current application in view on the phone. You can easily access the other dock applications by selecting on the notification curtain.

Access and display all of the phone applications on a larger display
